Day1.Exercise1: 1. Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks or brisk walk. (Calories burned: 100)
Day1.Exercise2: 2. Chest: Push-ups (3 sets x 10 reps) - 15 minutes. (Calories burned: 150)
Day1.Exercise3: 3. Back: Dumbbell Rows (3 sets x 10 reps) - 20 minutes. (Calories burned: 200)
Day1.Exercise5: Total time: 55 minutes. Total estimated calories burned: 500

Day2.Exercise3: 3. Back: Lat pulldown (3 sets x 10 reps) - 20 minutes. (Calories burned: 200)
Day2.Exercise5: Total time: 55 minutes. Total estimated calories burned: 500

Day7.Exercise1: 1. Warm-up: 10 minutes of jumping jacks, high knees or any other cardio of your choice. (Calories burned: 100)
Day7.Exercise2: 2. Chest: Cable Fly (3 sets x 10 reps) - 15 minutes. (Calories burned: 150)

Day7.Exercise7: Overall, this workout routine is designed to engage your chest and back muscles, focusing on strength and endurance. It should take around 55 minutes a day to complete each activity, with an estimated calorie burn of around 500 calories per day.
